Pre-Game Insights: India have remained unbeaten in the tournament so far, having defeated the likes of Australia and Pakistan en route.
England have managed to secure qualification despite losing against teams like South Africa and Australia.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India and England have faced each other 23 times in T20 internationals, with India winning 12 matches compared to England's 11 wins.
India has faced off against England in the World Cup 13 times since 1975 and won on 6 occasions.
The two teams have faced each other nine times in ODI World Cups where both teams have won 4 matches each, with one match in 2011 ending in a tie.
The two teams have only faced each other 4 times in T20 World Cups, with both teams winning 2 matches each.
Others: The match between India and England is scheduled to start at 8 PM IST on June 27, 2024, at the Providence Stadium in Guyana.
Fans in the subcontinent can catch the action live on Star Sports Network and Disney+ Hotstar app.
